title: Client Issues persistent since June
body:
So, this is somewhat open to everyone. My client has been slow/jerky since June, even after re-installation and even trying cortex to smooth it out for ram. I am confused as to why, as the new client had been smooth up until then. 

Is anyone else noticing that with each update it gets more and more problematic? Or could it be my more than adequate pc?

replies.body: Your client could be going through some stress, but it can also depend on when or where exactly it's being slow.  See if [low spec mode](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png) mode helps out at all!  Let me know.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Odfy1HmY,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-17T17:38:14.844+0000)
>
> Your client could be going through some stress, but it can also depend on when or where exactly it's being slow.  See if [low spec mode](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png) mode helps out at all!  Let me know.

I do currently have it switched to low spec mode. I have done everything possible to reduce the stress and it baffles me how it has had such a shift. It began to somewhat speed up over the micro updates that seem to happen (or whatever is occurring at those times), but in the latest patch it again dropped down to being clunky. It shows itself a lot when i attempt to access loot or the shop.

Thanks for following up with me, the sudden change is odd.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) in this case to grab some logs, and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team will be able to work with you individually and help get this fixed up.
